item.title: Winsome Yarns Ltd Falls 4.15%: 3 Key Events Shaping This Week’s Volatility
item.description: Winsome Yarns Ltd experienced a turbulent week from 5 to 9 January 2026, closing at Rs.1.85, down 4.15% from the previous Friday’s close of Rs.1.93. item.title: Jindal Drilling & Industries Ltd Falls 4.83%: Bearish Momentum and Price Pressure Mark the Week

item.title: National Aluminium Company Ltd Gains 5.37%: 6 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Momentum

item.title: Indian Overseas Bank Falls 5.91%: Downgrade and Mixed Signals Shape the Week
